innhold.avsnitt: The earliest mothers can apply for parental benefit is the 22nd week of pregnancy. If you have been given a date for a planned C-section, use this as the date of delivery in your application.

You must apply at the latest within three months of when your parental benefit should have started to ensure that you do not lose any days of parental benefit. If you apply more than three months after the child was born, you will lose days of parental benefit.
